text: Sérgio Manuel Freitas Abreu (born 16 May 1967) is a French football manager and a former player who most notably played for Braga. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primeira Liga for Fafe on 11 September 1988 in a 0–4 loss against Vitória de Setúbal. Over his career he played 314 games on the top level of Portuguese club football. ==References== ==External links== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bezons Category:French footballers Category:French people of Portuguese descent Category:Association football defenders Category:AD Fafe players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:F.C. title: Sérgio Abreu (footballer)
